TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OutputCacheParameters extends System.Object

summary.span: 封装 ASP.NET 根据 @ OutputCache 页指令分析的输出缓存初始化设置。

span.span: Encapsulates the output cache initialization settings parsed from an @ OutputCache page directive by ASP.NET.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类不由 ASP.NET 页面或控件开发人员使用。The class is not used by ASP.NET page or control developers. 它提供一种数据结构，用于存储由 ASP.NET 页和控件分析器（如和）从 [@ OutputCache](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/hdxfb6cy(v=vs.100)) 页指令分析的缓存设置 。It provides a data structure used to store cache settings parsed from an [@ OutputCache](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/hdxfb6cy(v=vs.100)) page directive by ASP.NET page and control parsers such as and . 对象与方法一起使用， 以便在运行时初始化页面及其内容的输出缓存。The object is used with the method to initialize the output cache for a page and its contents at run time.

span.span: Caching ASP.NET Pages

related.span: 缓存 ASP.NET 页面的部分

span.span: Caching Portions of an ASP.NET Page

summary.span: 获取或设置 名称，该名称与输出缓存项的设置关联。

span.span: Gets or sets an name that is associated with the settings of the output cache entry.

value.span: 与输出缓存项的设置关联的 名称。

span.span: An name that is associated with the settings of the output cache entry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 配置文件标识配置中的一组缓存设置 `` ，这些设置用作输出缓存项的基本设置。The profile identifies a set of cache settings in the `` configuration that is used as the base settings for the output cache entry.

summary.span: 获取或设置缓存项要保留在输出缓存中的时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of time that a cache entry is to remain in the output cache.

value.span: 缓存项保留在输出缓存中的时间（以秒为单位）。

span.span: The amount of time, in seconds, that a cache entry is to remain in the output cache.

value.span: 默认值为 0，指示没有时间限制。

span.span: The default is 0, which indicates an infinite duration.

summary.span: 获取或设置缓存项依赖的一组数据库和表名称对。

span.span: Gets or sets a set of database and table name pairs that the cache entry depends on.

value.span: 一个字符串，标识缓存项依赖的一组数据库和表名称对。

span.span: A string that identifies a set of database and table name pairs that the cache entry depends on.

value.span: 如果更新或更改了表的数据，则缓存项过期。

span.span: The cache entry is expired when the table's data is updated or changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该 字符串根据配置 (中 SQL Server 缓存依赖关系的名称标识数据库和表，通常使用 `` 配置元素) 进行添加。The string identifies databases and tables according to the name of a SQL Server cache dependency in your configuration (typically added using the `` configuration elements). 如果使用 SQL Server 2005，则可以将属性设置 为 "CommandNotification"，这将指示 ASP.NET 为当前 ASP.NET 页的上下文中发出的所有 SQL 命令创建行级依赖项。If you use SQL Server 2005, you can set the property to "CommandNotification", which instructs ASP.NET to create row-level dependencies for all SQL commands issued within the context of the current ASP.NET page.

[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于改变缓存项的一组逗号分隔的字符集（内容编码）。

span.span: Gets or sets a comma-delimited set of character sets (content encodings) used to vary the cache entry.

value.span: 改变内容时所依据的字符集的列表。

span.span: A list of character sets by which to vary the content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为多个字符集，则输出缓存会为每个指定的集包含不同版本的请求文档。When this property is set to multiple character sets, the output cache contains a different version of the requested document for each specified set. .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies).

span.span: Caching Multiple Versions of a Page

[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取或设置一组分号分隔的控件标识符，这些标识符包含在当前页或用户控件内，用于改变当前缓存项。

span.span: Gets or sets a semicolon-delimited set of control identifiers contained within the current page or user control used to vary the current cache entry.

value.span: 分号分隔的字符串列表，用于改变项的输出缓存。

span.span: A semicolon-separated list of strings used to vary an entry's output cache.

value.span: 属性设置为完全限定的控件标识符，其中标识符是控件 ID 的串联，从顶级父级控件开始并以美元符号 ($) 分隔。

span.span: The property is set to fully qualified control identifiers, where the identifier is a concatenation of control IDs starting from the top-level parent control and delimited with a dollar sign ($) character.

[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取输出缓存用来改变缓存项的自定义字符串列表。

span.span: Gets a list of custom strings that the output cache uses to vary the cache entry.
The list of custom strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果为此属性指定 "browser"，则该缓存条目将因浏览器类型和主要版本号而变化。If you specify "browser" for this property, the cache entry will be varied by browser type and major version number. 如果输入了自定义字符串，则必须在应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中重写 方法。If a custom string is entered, you must override the method in your application's Global.asax file.

span.span: Caching Multiple Versions of a Page

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于改变缓存项的一组逗号分隔的标头名称。

span.span: Gets or sets a comma-delimited set of header names used to vary the cache entry.

summary.span: 标头名称标识与请求关联的 HTTP 标头。

span.span: The header names identify HTTP headers associated with the request.

value.span: 改变内容所依据的标头列表。

span.span: A list of headers by which to vary the content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为多个标头，则输出缓存将为每个指定的标头包含不同版本的请求文档。When this property is set to multiple headers, the output cache contains a different version of the requested document for each specified header.

span.span: Caching Multiple Versions of a Page

member this.VaryByParam : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取查询字符串或窗体 POST 参数的分号分隔列表，该列表由输出缓存用来改变缓存项。

span.span: Gets a semicolon-delimited list of query string or form POST parameters that the output cache uses to vary the cache entry.

value.span: 查询字符串或窗体 POST 参数的列表。

span.span: The list of query string or form POST parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为多个参数，则输出缓存会为每个指定的参数包含不同版本的请求文档。When this property is set to multiple parameters, the output cache contains a different version of the requested document for each specified parameter. 可能的值包括“none”、“\*”以及任何有效的查询字符串或 POST 参数名。Possible values include "none", "\*", and any valid query string or POST parameter name.

span.span: Caching Multiple Versions of a Page
